name: Greenbrook TMS
reviews_summary: 4.5 stars. Patients report life-changing results for depression, though some cite administrative challenges. High effectiveness noted.
unique_selling_point: Nation's largest TMS provider with FDA-cleared NeuroStar technology.

name: Salience TMS Neuro Solutions
reviews_summary: 4.9 stars. 94% patient reported improvement. Highly rated for professional care and detailed remission stats.
unique_selling_point: High remission rates (59%) and extensive insurance coverage including Medicare.

name: Texas TMS Center
reviews_summary: 4.8 stars. Specialized in Deep TMS with BrainsWay. Patients praise the targeted approach for OCD and Depression.
unique_selling_point: Specializes in BrainsWay Deep TMS for Depression and OCD.

name: Cedar Park TMS
reviews_summary: 5.0 stars. Offers 'Express TMS' (3-minute sessions) using MagVenture. Highly convenient for working professionals.
unique_selling_point: Offers Express TMS (3-minute sessions) and takes Tricare.

name: Houston Mind & Brain
reviews_summary: 4.7 stars. Dr. Raymond Cho praised for expertise. Offers Deep TMS and personalized psychiatric care.
unique_selling_point: Led by Dr. Raymond Cho, focuses on treatment-resistant cases.
